segments.text: My name is Sue . How do you do , Mr . Black ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad to meet you , Sue . Please have a seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We've looked over your letter and resume and I'm very satisfied with them . Today I want to invite you talk about insurance you're interested in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I wonder whether I can enjoy the life insurance and health insurance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . A two-week paid vacation a year , a five-day workweek .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . All the insurance will be linked with your work . We will issue an insurance policy .
segments.speaker: S2
